sentence: The image is a screenshot of a webpage for "Homeopathy Helpline."
sentence_cn: 该图是“顺势疗法帮助热线”网页的截图。

sentence: - The title "HOMEOPATHY HELPLINE" in green and grey at the top, with the phrase "Dedicated to delivering individual solutions to your health problems using homeopathy. since 1984."
sentence_cn: - 顶部用绿色和灰色标出“顺势疗法热线”的标题，并写着“自 1984 年以来，致力于通过顺势疗法为您的健康问题提供个性化解决方案。”
words: Dedicated to delivering individual solutions to your health problems using homeopathy. since 1984.

sentence: - On the left, there's a navigation menu with links: Welcome, Consultations, About Homeopathy, About Francis Treuherz, Support & Supervision, Books by Francis, Articles & Resources, London Homeopath Blog, and Contact.
sentence_cn: - 左侧有一个带有链接的导航菜单：欢迎、咨询、关于顺势疗法、关于 Francis Treuherz、支持和监督、Francis 的书籍、文章和资源、伦敦顺势疗法博客和联系方式。

sentence: - Below the menu, there are small images of homeopathic bottles and a book cover that says "Books by Francis."
sentence_cn: - 菜单下方是顺势疗法药瓶的小图像和写着“弗朗西斯的书籍”的书封面。

sentence: - In the main content area, there is a header with "Welcome" and a statement about Francis Treuherz, a registered homeopath with 30 years of experience.
sentence_cn: - 在主要内容区域，有一个带有“欢迎”的标题和关于 Francis Treuherz 的声明，他是一位拥有 30 年经验的注册顺势疗法医生。

sentence: - A quote is highlighted in green: ¡°I established this to ensure that the best quality advice, care and information is available to people
sentence_cn: - 引言以绿色突出显示：“我建立这个机构是为了确保人们能够获得最优质的建议、护理和信息

sentence: wherever in the world they live.¡±
sentence_cn: 无论他们生活在世界的哪个角落。”

sentence: - On the right side, there's a Facebook link and a section titled "About Francis" with a photo of an older man with a beard and glasses.
sentence_cn: - 右侧有一个 Facebook 链接和一个名为“关于弗朗西斯”的部分，其中有一张留着胡须、戴着眼镜的老年男子的照片。

sentence: The description notes his practice since 1984 in London NW2.
sentence_cn: 描述中提到了他自 1984 年以来在伦敦 NW2 的执业经历。

sentence: - An image of homeopathic pills on a leaf and a blurred background is at the top of the main content.
sentence_cn: - 主要内容的顶部是一张位于叶子上的顺势疗法药丸的图片，背景模糊。

sentence: The overall color scheme includes greens, white, and grey.
sentence_cn: 整体配色方案包括绿色、白色和灰色。
